Render a sparkline card

render_sparkline_card.Rd

Render a sparkline card

Usage

render_sparkline_card(
  data,
  x_var,
  y_var = NULL,
  value = NULL,
  subtitle = "",
  agg = "count",
  line_color = "#2b74ff",
  bg_color = "#ffffff",
  text_color = "#111827",
  height = 130,
  smooth = 0.6,
  area_opacity = 0.18,
  filter_expr = NULL,
  value_prefix = "",
  value_suffix = "",
  connect_group = NULL,
  backend = "echarts4r"
)

Arguments

data

Data frame (page data)

x_var

X variable name

y_var

Y variable name (NULL for count/cumcount)

value

Main value to display (auto-computed if NULL)

subtitle

Subtitle text

agg

Aggregation: "count", "cumcount", "sum", "cumsum", "mean"

line_color

Line color

bg_color

Background color

text_color

Text color

height

Sparkline height in pixels

smooth

Smoothing factor

area_opacity

Area fill opacity

filter_expr

Optional filter expression string

value_prefix

Prefix for displayed value

value_suffix

Suffix for displayed value

backend

Chart backend
